name: ULTRA CLIMBING PLAYGROUNDS (VR Platformer/Climbing Game for Oculus Quest)
name_original: ULTRA CLIMBING PLAYGROUNDS (VR Platformer/Climbing Game for Oculus Quest)
description:
This is a demo game if you want to experiment with free climbing, ziplining, platforming and plank walking but on levels you haven't seen yet! 

It has 8 different scenes:

  1. Digital Playground (where you start)
  2. Play Area
  3. City Playground
  4. Sky City
  5. Super Plank
  6. Ultra Plank
  7. Ultra Zipline
  8. Ultra Platformer

The game mechanics presented in this demo may be used in other games of ours like in Ultra Height: Mist City Climb: https://ultra-fun-games.itch.io/ultra-height-mist-city-climb
